# center

**Instance Property**

The center of the effect, as x and y coordinates.

## Declaration

```swift
var center: CGPoint { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **amount**: The zoom-in amount.
- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.

items.description: The image to use as an input image.
